price: 75. Et (l’autre) de répondre : « Ne t’avais-je pas dit que tu ne saurais rester patient en ma compagnie ? »
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
